kndatacleanup.data_checker module¶

class kndatacleanup.data_checker.Checker(run_parameters)¶

Bases: object

static check_index_header(dataframe)¶
static check_values(dataframe)¶
condition_check()¶

Customized checks for input data (contains NA value, contains all real number, contains all positive number) Args:

dataframe: input DataFrame to be checked check_na: check NA in DataFrame dropna_colwise: drop column which contains NA check_real_number: check only real number exists in DataFrame check_positive_number: check only positive number exists in DataFrame
Returns:
dataframe: cleaned DataFrame
kndatacleanup.data_checker.checker()¶

kndatacleanup.data_cleanup module¶

kndatacleanup.data_cleanup.data_cleanup()¶
kndatacleanup.data_cleanup.run_pipelines(run_parameters, method)¶

kndatacleanup.data_cleanup_toolbox module¶

This module serves as a connecting function between front end and back end. It validates/cleans the user spreadsheet data and returns a boolean value to indicate if the user spreadsheet is valid or not.
